abstract: Bank of America shares skidded 11.2 percent on Monday after an analyst said the largest United States bank might suffer a $3.6 billion fourth-quarter loss and again slash its dividend.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America shares skidded 11.2 percent on Monday after an analyst said the largest United States bank might suffer a $3.6 billion fourth-quarter loss and again slash its dividend.

headline.main: Bank of America Stock Drops on Loss Worries
